fields.name: Cash Disbursements
fields.description: Tracks expenses that are paid out to external entities such as salaries, bills and rent.

fields.name: Cash Receipts
fields.description: Records all cash received by an organization such as deposits made as capital from owners and investors as well as customer payments

fields.name: Sales
fields.description: Tracks sales made and in store credit

fields.name: Purchases
fields.description: Tracks transactions of items purchased by the business for sale at a later date.

fields.name: General
fields.description: Tracks transactions that don't fit in the big 4 journals - Purchases, Sales, Cash Disbursements and Cash Receipts
